full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGON PO SNYING BZHUGS DANG 'BREL BA'I 'PHO BA'I MAN NGAG MKHA' SPYOD NYE LAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021B (CES MGON PO SNYING GZHUGS DANG 'BREL BA'I 'PHO BA'I MAN NGAG MKHA' SPYOD NYE LAM ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I 'BYUNG GNAS CHOS SDE CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL NAS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DPAL RAS BA DAM CHOS KYI NAN TAN CHEN POS YANG YANG BSKUL BA BZHIN ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS 'PHRAL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DAR MA BRIS SO, ,'DIS KYANG BDAG BZHAN SEMS CAN THAMS CAD MKHA' SPYOD CHEN PO GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,)
